title: Kaatre En Vaasal Vandhaai Lyrics Rhythm
stanzas: <div>Kaatre En Vaasal Vandhaai Song Lyrics Rhythm

[Kaatre en vaasal vandhaai
medhuvaaga kadhavu thirandhai
kaatre un peyarai kaetten
kadhal endraai

netru nee engu irundhaai
kaatre nee solvaai endren
swasaththil irundhathaaga
solli chendraai

thulli varum kaatre
thulli varum kaatre
thaaimozhi paesu
nilam ulla varaiyil
nilam ulla varaiyil
nenjinil veesu

thulli varum kaatre
thulli varum kaatre
thaai mozhi paesu ] (2)

Kaatre en vaasal vandhaai
medhuvaaga kadhavu thirandhai
kaatre un peyarai kaetten
kadhal endraai

kaarkaalam azhaikkumpodhu
olindhukolla idam vendum
thaavani kudai pidipaayaa

anbae naan uranga vendum
azhagaana idam vendum
kangalil idam koduppaayaa

nee en arugil vandhu neliya
naan un manadhil sendru oliya
nee un manadhil en uruvam
kandupidippaaya!!

pookkalukulle thaen
ulla varaiyil
kadhalar vazhga(2)

boomikku maele
vaan ulla varaiyil
kadhalum vazhga

Kaatre en vaasal vandhaai
medhuvaaga kadhavu thirandhai
kaatre un peyarai kaetten
kadhal endraai

netru nee engu irundhaai
kaatre nee solvaai endren
swasaththil irundhathaaga
solli chendraai

nedunkaalam sirpikkule
urundu nirkkum
muththup pol
en penmai thirandhu
nirkkiradhe...

thirakkaatha sirippi
ennai thirandhukolla
solgiradhaa
en nenjam arandu
nirkkiradhe..

naan siragodinthen
endru ninaithaen
un varugaiyinaal
vayatharindhen
enai marubadiyum
siru pillaiyaai seivaayaa!!

kattilidum vayathil
thottilida sonnaal
sariyaa sariyaa (2)

kattilil iruvarum
kuzhandhaigal aanaal
pizhaiya pizhaiyaa

Kaatre en vaasal vandhaai
medhuvaaga kadhavu thirandhai
kaatre un peyarai kaetten
kadhal endraai

netru nee engu irundhaai
kaatre nee solvaai endren
swasaththil irundhathaaga
solli chendraai

thulli varum kaatre
thulli varum kaatre
thaaimozhi paesu
nilam ulla varaiyil
nilam ulla varaiyil
nenjinil veesu

thulli varum kaatre
thulli varum kaatre
thaaimozhi paesu

seo.title: Kaatre En Vaasal Vandhaai Lyrics Rhythm
seo.description: Get the complete Kaatre En Vaasal Vandhaai Lyrics Rhythm from Rhythm. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Kavita Krishnamurthy. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Rhythm, AR Rahman, Kavita Krishnamurthy, Unnikrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
